t: Are Generic and Store-Brand Spices as Good as More Expensive Brands?
s: May 1, 2019 - They have a large research and ... market trends, and now offer a wide variety of global spice mixes. McCormick products include a best-used-by date. They have apparently done so for years, although, as a passionate spice buyer, I can attest that they were quite cryptically coded until a few years ago. They now have a very clear year-month system. Roxanne Edwards, of the Consumer Affairs Department at Stop & Shop, has a different take on the quality of spices. Stop & Shop-branded spices come ...
